name: eth_dublin
description: Zero-Knowledge Passport Verification - Eth Dublin Hackathon

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile" "npm run dev:blockchain"
scripts.build:all: npm run build && cd MobileApp && npm run android --release && cd ../MobilePass && npm run compile
scripts.test:all: npm run lint && cd MobileApp && npm test && cd ../MobilePass && npm test
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && cd MobileApp && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../MobilePass && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json cache artifacts
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run setup:mobile && npm run setup:blockchain

author: Your Team Name
